org.icesoft.testclient
Class ActionThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      org.icesoft.testclient.ActionThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ActionThread
extends java.lang.Thread

The ActionThread is the Thread that runs through the Actors to do the work against the server. There is one ActionThread per client. The behaviour is: 

  start
    doInitialDelay()
    for (repeatCount )
       for (Actor a: actorList)
          a.act( controller );
       }
       doInterRequestDelay()
    }

ActionThread

public ActionThread(Client controller,
                    java.lang.String name)
Define the actionThread. This will extract the loop parameters out of the controller, but they may be overridden at run time using the property setters.

Parameters:
controller - Client
name - String name
